bottom.exit_button_tooltip: Despite of application settings, your passphrase will be deleted from browser. It is recommended to always log out after completion of usage

chats.ico_message: Now you have a possibility to buy tokens of ADAMANT, the most secure and anonymous messenger, with the cheapest price. Please make sure your have saved the passphrase to this account — log out from your account and open it again. It is recommeded to save your passphrase on a paper for backup. But remember, only *you are responsible for the passphrase safety*. It can not be recovered. And if other person will gain access to it, your money will be stolen. Treat this issue as secure, as if tokens in your wallet will cost a billion dollars one day. To buy ADM tokens, go to "Wallet" tab and click "Buy tokens", or open the page adamant.im/buy-tokens in the web browser. In the form enter your ADAMANT wallet address — you will receive ADM tokens there. If you moved from Messenger App, your ADAMANT wallet address will be filled already, other way go back to the Messenger and click ADAMANT address to copy it to the clipboard. Next, choose crypto you want to spend and its amount. You will see how much ADM tokens you receive, including volume bonus: 20–30 ETH: +20%, 30–50 ETH: +30%, 50–90 ETH: +40%, 90+ ETH: +50%. Click "Buy ADM tokens". You will get unique address where you need to send tokens. As soon as your transaction will be confirmed, you will receive ADM tokens. Transaction can be done *from any wallet or exchange*. It is not necessary to transfer exact amount including transaction fees, the payment will be processed anyway. Do not reply to this message, it is a system account. If you still have any questions, contact us by address U15677078342684640219
chats.new_chat_tooltip: Click to start a chat with a new partner
chats.no_money: Not enough tokens. Please, replenish your balance
chats.recipient_tooltip: Enter a partner address in the format U1234567890
chats.retry_message: Message did not sent, weak connection. Click to retry
chats.title: Chats
chats.welcome_message: Welcome to ADAMANT, the most secure and anonymous messenger. Remember, your security and anonymity is also up to you. Do not follow links you receive, otherwise your IP can be compromised. Do not trust browser extensions. It is better to share your ADAMANT address personally, but not using other messengers. Keep your passphrase secure. Set a password on your device or log out after completion of usage. Learn more about security and anonymity at adamant.im/ru-staysecured. All the transactions within the blockchain do need to have their minimal fees. This is necessary to support the network infrastructure. To start messaging now, *get free tokens* — go to Wallet tab and click Free ADM tokens. Then click "Start new chat" on Chats tab and enter your partner's addres or scan his QR code. To copy your address, click "COPY" on on Wallet tab. Do not reply to this message, it is a system account. If you still have any questions, contact us by U15677078342684640219

home.invest_btn_tooltip: Now you have a possibility to buy tokens of ADAMANT, the most secure and anonymous messenger, with the cheapest price. Click to go to ICO form adamant.im/buy-tokens
home.send_btn_tooltip: Click to transfer supported tokens to other account or ADAMANT user
home.your_address_tooltip_ADM: This is your ADAMANT unique identifier. Click to copy it to the clipboard
home.your_address_tooltip_BNB: This is your ADAMANT's Binance Coin wallet unique identifier. Click to copy it to the clipboard
home.your_address_tooltip_ETH: This is your ADAMANT's Ethereum wallet unique identifier. Click to copy it to the clipboard
home.your_balance_tooltip_ADM: This is your ADM tokens balance. Click to see all incoming and outcoming transactions
home.your_balance_tooltip_BNB: This is your BNB tokens balance
home.your_balance_tooltip_ETH: This is your ETH tokens balance

login.copy_button_tooltip: Click to copy the passphrase to clipboard. Save it in a password keeper application. To log in to your new Wallet, enter it in the passphrase field
login.create_address_label: Or create a new anonymous address:
login.invalid_qr_code: QR code does not contain passphrase or unable to recognise
login.login_by_qr_code_tooltip: Login by passphrase encoded in QR code file
login.new_passphrase_label: Save the passphrase for new wallet and messenger account. No need to enter login, only the passphrase. If you lose it, there is no way to recover
login.save_button_tooltip: Click to save your passphrase in a text file. Save it in the secure place only!
login.scan_qr_code_button_tooltip: Scan a QR code with passphrase via device camera
login.subheader: A top-notch anonymous messenger encrypted with a blockchain

login_via_password.article_hint: Read information about user password on

options.already_delegate_text: You are already a delegate. Delegate name is:
options.enable_bar_tooltip: Shows new message counter in the tab title. Works on desktop browsers
options.enable_sound_tooltip: Play a sound notification when new message received. Some devices does not support it (a mobile browser stay silent if not active)
options.exit_on_close_tooltip: For your wallet security we recommend you keep this checkbox turned on. If you turn it off, your passphrase will be saved in browser, and next time you open the wallet it will be decrypted without a need to enter passphrase. This option only acceptable in a case when nobody else can access your device
options.send_on_enter_tooltip: Send messages by Enter key, new line by combination Shift+Enter. By default, combination Ctrl+Enter or Cmd+Enter (Mac) is used to send messages

scan.connect_camera: Connect the camera and try again
scan.hold_your_device: Hold your device steady for 2-3 seconds towards the QR code you want to scan

login.modal_header: Scan QR code with a passphrase

new-chat.modal_header: Scan QR code with ADAMANT wallet address

scan.something_wrong: Unexpected error. Check the adm console application

transfer.error_erc20_fee: You also need {fee} to pay the transfer fee
transfer.no_address_text: This user does not have a public {crypto} wallet yet. To retrieve it, he should log in to the messenger with more than 0.001 ADM at balance
